attributes.action: Ban all political parties and introduce 100% independant MP's from all English counties on minimum wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All MP's should be independant and support their local areas on minimum wage. Voted in MP's can then be voted in genral election for positions on the cabinet.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
